masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Our delivery drone fleet has gone HAYWIRE! A software update corrupted their navigationâ€”200 drones are dropping packages randomly across the city! Some are landing in pools, on roofs, in traffic! One just dropped a 50-pound package through someone's sunroof!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop the drones from causing more damage
  • Catch falling packages before they hurt someone
  • Find a way to override the corrupted software
